parameters.name: FaceSet1Count
parameters.description: Number of faces in first set of faces

parameters.name: FaceSet2Count
parameters.description: Number of faces in second set of faces

title: IWeldmentBeadFeatureData.GetFacesCount
description: Gets the number of faces in each sets of faces whose intersection defines the edges to which this weld bead is applied.
signature:
void GetFacesCount( 
   System.Int32
Side
,
   out System.Int32
FaceSet1Count
,
   out System.Int32
FaceSet2Count
)

parameters.name: FaceSet1Count
parameters.description: Number of faces in first set of faces

parameters.name: FaceSet2Count
parameters.description: Number of faces in second set of faces

remarks:
Call this method before calling
IWeldmentBeadFeatureData::IGetFaces
.
